values.description: = Cuts the maximum amount from the intersection profiles on the top and bottom of the sheet metal body

= Adjusts the layer where the intersection curve intersects the sheet metal body; Select a reference plane or top or bottom face to define the offset plane and then either set ISMNormalCutFeatureData2::LinkToKFactor to true or set ISMNormalCutFeatureData2::LayerAdjustmentValue to a value between 0 and 1 to adjust the layer
